languages.text: {n}Урбенд внимательно изучает окровавленный лист бумаги.{/n} "Выглядит как еще одна улика против рода Версериан. Возможно, они действительно надеялись погубить вас или хотя бы вызвать суматоху покушением, чтобы под шумок сбежать из-под стражи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Урбенд внимательно изучает окровавленный лист бумаги.{/n} "Выглядит как еще одна улика против рода Версериан. Возможно, Версерианы действительно надеялись убить вас или хотя бы вызвать суматоху покушением, чтобы под шумок сбежать из-под стражи".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."
languages.original_text: {n}Урбенд внимательно изучает окровавленный лист бумаги.{/n} "Выглядит как еще одна улика против рода Версериан. Возможно, они действительно надеялись погубить вас или хотя бы вызвать суматоху покушением, чтобы под шумок сбежать из-под стражи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend looks closely at the bloodied paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps, they have truly wished to kill you or at least cause a panic to escape custody during the mass confusion."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend looks closely at the bloodied paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps, they have truly wished to kill you or at least cause a panic to escape custody during the mass confusion."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend looks closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps, they truly wished to kill you or at least cause a stir to escape custody during the mass confusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend looks closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps, they truly wished to kill you or at least cause a stir to escape custody during the mass confusion."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}ドライブステン総督は血塗れの紙をじっくり見る。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家が有罪である証拠のひとつです。おそらく、本気であなたを殺すつもりだったか、最悪でも動揺させて後の大混乱のうちに監禁から逃れるつもりだったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステン総督は血塗れの紙をじっくり見る。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家が有罪である証拠のひとつです。おそらく、本気であなたを殺すつもりだったか、最悪でも動揺させて後の大混乱のうちに監禁から逃れるつもりだったのでしょう」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔总督仔细地读了一遍染血的信笺。{/n}“这似乎是指控韦尔森家族的又一项铁证。或许他们真的想刺杀您，或者至少也要打算引发骚动，趁乱越狱。”
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."

traits.locale_text: {n}厄本仔细地读了一遍染血的信笺。{/n}“这似乎是指控韦尔森家族的又一项铁证。或许他们真的想刺杀您，或者至少也要打算引发骚动，趁乱越狱。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur Drivestem examine le papier taché de sang.{/n} « Cela m'a tout l'air d'être une nouvelle preuve incriminant la maison Werserian. Ils espéraient peut-être vous tuer, ou ne serait-ce que provoquer la panique et profiter de la confusion générale pour s'enfuir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend examine le papier taché de sang.{/n} « Cela m'a tout l'air d'être une nouvelle preuve incriminant la maison Werserian. Ils espéraient peut-être vous tuer, ou ne serait-ce que provoquer la panique et profiter de la confusion générale pour s'enfuir. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}El gobernador Drivestern mira de cerca el papel manchado de sangre.{/n} «Parece otra prueba más que incrimina a la casa Werserian. Probablemente quisieran acabar con su vida, o al menos causar revuelo para poder escapar durante la confusión».
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend mira de cerca el papel manchado de sangre.{/n} «Parece otra prueba más que incrimina a la casa Werserian. Probablemente quisieran acabar con su vida o causar revuelo para poder escapar gracias a la confusión».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Gouverneur Drivestem betrachtet das blutverschmierte Papier genau.{/n} "Das scheint ein weiterer Beweis zu sein, der das Haus Werserian belastet. Vielleicht wollten sie Euch wirklich töten, oder zumindest für eine Ablenkung sorgen, um während der allgemeinen Verwirrung zu entwischen."
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend betrachtet das blutverschmierte Papier.{/n} "Das scheint ein weiterer Beweis zu sein, der das Haus Werserian belastet. Vielleicht wollten sie Euch wirklich töten, oder zumindest für eine Ablenkung sorgen, um während der allgemeinen Verwirrung zu entwischen."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Vali Drivestem, kan lekeli kâğıdı yakından inceliyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi aleyhindeki bir başka delile benziyor. Belki de sahiden sizi öldürmeye niyetlenmişlerdir. Olmadı en azından olaylardan sonra çıkan karışıklık sırasında kaçmak için bir şeyler denemişler."
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem peers closely at the blood-stained paper.{/n} "It looks like another piece of evidence incriminating House Werserian. Perhaps they truly did intend to kill you, or at least cause a stir to help them escape custody during the confusion that followed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali Drivestem, kan lekeli kâğıdı yakından inceliyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi aleyhinde bir diğer delil gibi görünüyor. Belki de sahiden sizi öldürmeye niyetlenmişlerdi. Ya da en azından olaylardan sonra çıkan karışıklıkta kaçmak için bir şeyler denemişler."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
